member.name: T:Resources.Global
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbAccountActivated
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Your account has been successfully activated..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbChangeForgottenPassword
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This page allows you to specify your new password. Please enter your new password, confirm it in the second box, then click Continue..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbChangePassword
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to This page allows you to easily change your password and security questions.

Please enter your password, optional new password and optional amended security questions. when you are happy with your answers, click Continue..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to New passwords are required to be a minimum of {0} characters in length..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Your password has been changed successfully..

member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to By signing in as a different user, you will be signed out of all the web applications you are currently signed into.

You are currently signed into:.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbConfirmSignout2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Are you sure you want sign out of all web applications and sign in as a different user?.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbCustomerServices
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to

Please contact customer services to have your password reset.

Our telephone lines are open Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm and if you send us an email, we aim to get back to you by the end of the next working day.

.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbForceChangePassword
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To ensure the continued security of your account, you are required to periodically update your password. Please enter a new password and confirmation to continue..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbLanguagePopup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Sage ID is available in multiple languages, with the initial language selection based on information from your browser. If this selection is inappropriate, please select a different language from the options shown below..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbLinkExpired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The activation link has expired. Please contact support..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbManageAuthorisation
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to This page allows you to easily view and remove any authorisations, or access, you have granted other applications to your Sage resources.

Once you have selected authorisations to remove, click Continue..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbNoAuthorisationsToManage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You have not granted any other applications access to your Sage resources..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbPasswordChangedSuccessfully
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The account password has been successfully updated..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbRecovery
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Please enter the email address associated with your Sage Sign In account, along with the words shown in the image. Once you have done this, please click Continue..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbRegisterAccount
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to

Creating a Sage Sign In Account helps us provide you with information that is suited to your particular needs and interests, which means it's easier for you to find what you need.

We also use the Sage Sign In Account to help us keep your personal account information safe and secure.

Whether you're buying or registering any of our software or services or using one of our other web services, a Sage Sign In Account helps to ensure that your account information is secure and available to you [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbSecurityQuestion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To confirm your identity you must answer the security questions, which you selected and provided an answer to when you created your account..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbSignIn
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Sage ID allows you to access all your Sage Services with a single username. To sign in, please enter your username and password..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to To sign in, please enter your username and password..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.BlurbSignOnAdditional

As you are already signed into one or more web applications you can sign into another without having to re-enter your username and password. To sign in, click the button below..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipAutoSignIn
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Automatically sign in to this application allows you to sign in without having to enter your credentials in the future.

It is not recommended to use this feature on a shared computer..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipCaptcha
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This step has been included to ensure your account is safe from machine based attacks. Please enter the two words which are displayed so the web application knows you are human..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRecoveryUsername
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Your user name is what uniquely identifies you to Sage applications. e.g. john.smith, my.company etc.

Enter it here if you have forgotten your password..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRegisterCaptcha
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This step has been included to ensure only humans and not machines can register. Please enter the two words which are displayed..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRegisterEmail
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Your email address uniquely identifies you to Sage applications.

A valid email address should be provided so that you can activate your account and receive account emails from the system..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRegisterPassword
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Please enter a password to protect your account. It must be at least {0} characters long and should contain a mixture of upper, lower and special characters to help ensure maximum security..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRegisterUsername
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The name provides a friendlier way for the system to address you.

For instance, applications will use the name on welcome screens e.g. Hello John Smith..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipRememberMe
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Remember me on this computer saves your username on your computer so that you don't have to retype it the next time you sign in.

It is not recommended to use this feature on a shared computer..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipSecurityAnswer
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to When your account was created you selected, and provided an answer to, a security question. This question is currently displayed above the answer box.

To reset your password you need to provide the answer to this security question..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.ToolTipUseEmailForUsername
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Use email address for your username sets your username to be the same as your email address.

This may make your username easier to remember..

member.name: P:Resources.Global.UnknownError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support..

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbAccountActivated
member.summary: Your account has been successfully activated.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbChangeForgottenPassword
member.summary: This page allows you to specify your new password. Please enter your new password, confirm it in the second box, then click Continue.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbChangePassword
member.summary:
This page allows you to easily change your password and security questions.

Please enter your password, optional new password and optional amended security questions. when you are happy with your answers, click Continue.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbChangePassword2
member.summary: New passwords are required to be a minimum of {0} characters in length.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbChangePasswordSuccess
member.summary: Your password has been changed successfully.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbConfirmSignout
member.summary:
By signing in as a different user, you will be signed out of all the web applications you are currently signed into.

You are currently signed into:

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbConfirmSignout2
member.summary: Are you sure you want sign out of all web applications and sign in as a different user?

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbCustomerServices
member.summary:
Please contact customer services to have your password reset.

Our telephone lines are open Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm and if you send us an email, we aim to get back to you by the end of the next working day.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbForceChangePassword
member.summary: To ensure the continued security of your account, you are required to periodically update your password. Please enter a new password and confirmation to continue.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbLanguagePopup
member.summary: Sage ID is available in multiple languages, with the initial language selection based on information from your browser. If this selection is inappropriate, please select a different language from the options shown below.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbLinkExpired
member.summary: The activation link has expired. Please contact support.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbManageAuthorisation
member.summary:
This page allows you to easily view and remove any authorisations, or access, you have granted other applications to your Sage resources.

Once you have selected authorisations to remove, click Continue.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbPasswordChangedSuccessfully
member.summary: The account password has been successfully updated.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbRecovery
member.summary: Please enter the email address associated with your Sage Sign In account, along with the words shown in the image. Once you have done this, please click Continue.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbRegisterAccount
member.summary:
Creating a Sage Sign In Account helps us provide you with information that is suited to your particular needs and interests, which means it's easier for you to find what you need.

We also use the Sage Sign In Account to help us keep your personal account information safe and secure.

Whether you're buying or registering any of our software or services or using one of our other web services, a Sage Sign In Account helps to ensure that your account information is secure and available to you in one central location.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbSecurityQuestion
member.summary: To confirm your identity you must answer the security questions, which you selected and provided an answer to when you created your account.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbSignIn
member.summary: Sage ID allows you to access all your Sage Services with a single username. To sign in, please enter your username and password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbSignInIPhone
member.summary: To sign in, please enter your username and password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.BlurbSignOnAdditional
member.summary: Sage ID allows you to access all your Sage Services with a single username. As you are already signed into one or more web applications you can sign into another without having to re-enter your username and password. To sign in, click the button below.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ButtonAllow
member.summary: Allow

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipAutoSignIn
member.summary:
Automatically sign in to this application allows you to sign in without having to enter your credentials in the future.

It is not recommended to use this feature on a shared computer.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipCaptcha
member.summary: This step has been included to ensure your account is safe from machine based attacks. Please enter the two words which are displayed so the web application knows you are human.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRecoveryUsername
member.summary:
Your user name is what uniquely identifies you to Sage applications. e.g. john.smith, my.company etc.

Enter it here if you have forgotten your password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRegisterCaptcha
member.summary: This step has been included to ensure only humans and not machines can register. Please enter the two words which are displayed.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRegisterEmail
member.summary:
Your email address uniquely identifies you to Sage applications.

A valid email address should be provided so that you can activate your account and receive account emails from the system.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRegisterPassword
member.summary: Please enter a password to protect your account. It must be at least {0} characters long and should contain a mixture of upper, lower and special characters to help ensure maximum security.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRegisterUsername
member.summary:
The name provides a friendlier way for the system to address you.

For instance, applications will use the name on welcome screens e.g. Hello John Smith.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipRememberMe
member.summary:
Remember me on this computer saves your username on your computer so that you don't have to retype it the next time you sign in.

It is not recommended to use this feature on a shared computer.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipSecurityAnswer
member.summary:
When your account was created you selected, and provided an answer to, a security question. This question is currently displayed above the answer box.

To reset your password you need to provide the answer to this security question.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ToolTipUseEmailForUsername
member.summary:
Use email address for your username sets your username to be the same as your email address.

This may make your username easier to remember.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.UnknownError
member.summary: An unknown error occurred. Please verify your entry and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationCaptchaIncorrect
member.summary: The words that were entered were not correct.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationCaptchaMissing
member.summary: You must enter the two words that are displayed in the image.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationChangeNothingToDo
member.summary: The password or security questions have not been changed.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationChangePasswordFail
member.summary: The current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationConfirmPasswordInvalid
member.summary: The new password and confirmation password do not match.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationConfirmPasswordMissing
member.summary: You must confirm your password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationDuplicateEmail
member.summary: A username for that email address already exists. Please enter a different email address.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationEmailInvalid
member.summary: You must specify a valid email address.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationEmailMissing
member.summary: You must specify an email address.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationIncorrectCredentials
member.summary: The email or password provided is incorrect.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationMaxLength
member.summary: The field is too long. Use less characters.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationNewPasswordGuessable
member.summary: The new password must not be easily guessable.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationNewPasswordHistorial
member.summary: The new password you entered has been used before. Please choose another.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationNewPasswordMinLength
member.summary: The new password must be at least 8 characters long.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationNewPasswordMissing
member.summary: You must specify a new password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationPasswordComplexity
member.summary: The password you have entered is not complex enough. It is recommended to use upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters to ensure a strong password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationPasswordGuessable
member.summary: The password must not be easily guessable.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationPasswordMinLength
member.summary: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationPasswordMissing
member.summary: You must specify a password.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityAnswerIncorrect
member.summary: The answer to the security question is incorrect.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityAnswerMinLength
member.summary: The answer to the security question must be at least 5 characters long.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityAnswerMissing
member.summary: You must provide an answer to the security question.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityAnswersDifferent
member.summary: Please select three different security questions.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityQuestionMinLength
member.summary: You must provide your own security question. It must be longer than 5 characters.

member.name: F:Resources.SSO.ValidationSecurityQuestionMissing
member.summary: You must select a security question from the list.
